snippet: In addition to visiting the White House, Mr. Xi will go to New York for events marking the 70th anniversary of the United Nations’ founding, the state media report said.
abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping will make his first official visit to United States in September.
lead_paragraph: In addition to visiting the White House, Mr. Xi will go to New York for events marking the 70th anniversary of the United Nations’ founding, the state media report said.

headline.main: President Xi Jinping to Visit U.S. in September, Chinese Agency Reports
headline.print_headline: China: President Xi Plans to Visit U.S. in September
